results.name: Expansion of x^2*(1+x)*(1-x+x^2) / ((1-x)^2*(1+x^2)^2).
comment: Old definition was: "Starting with 0, 1, 2, 3, ... (A001477), write 0, 0 instead of a(0), 1, 1 instead of a(3) and in general n, n instead of a(3n)".
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (2,-3,4,-3,2,-1).
